Radarr/Radarr

Automates movie downloads, sorting, and upgrades for your collection

View on index

Related repos

  • Automatically adds trending box office movies to Radarr
  • Tracks movies and series with personal lists
  • Organizes media libraries without Sonarr or Radarr
  • syncs Plex watchlists with Sonarr and Radarr for automated media downloads
  • iOS app for Radarr and Sonarr management
  • Automates media requests from lists
  • Imports YouTube videos into Radarr library
  • Finds and subscribes to RSS feeds from the browser
